content: The terrain on our planet is a bit more varied now, and I'm feeling quite inspired, so I've sketched this <style=Highlight>bridge</style> onto an Inspo Card. I'd like you to have it.
info: 户外装饰反馈-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A想象}<style=Highlight>Bridges</style> can be placed over rivers. They're handy for getting across, and they look great too! Hoho, is there anything else you need?
